subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Family hour around the radio
author: bruce halliday
full_text:
--_a3a2b3e7-191a-4d9e-98b3-38fb7d9f93db_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Babs,
 
I am thinking of contacting ron the maker of the mini box and offer=
 
to put a page on my box website explaining the do's and don'ts of box res=
earch and the dangers involved and also the resposibility involed in box 
o=
wnership and research. And I'm hoping that will help some of the people who=
 are going in blind and buying a mini box will understand what the basics a=
re.
 
hopefully they can put a link on their mini box sale page.
 
Bruce

B=
ruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comF=
rom: babiarz3@...: Fri, 23 Nov 2007 22:13:56 +0000Subject: [EVP-I=
TC] Re: Family hour around the radio




Hi Bruce~I understand the light he=
artedness of the "family hour" posts. I don'ttake any issue with that at al=
l. The families of those of us involvedin the paranormal HAVE to be a bit d=
ifferent then the average Joe's orSmith's. I only referred to that topic be=
cause of the other stuffmentioned- negativity and dark ones.There is absolu=
tely nothing in place to safe guard who purchases thebox and who doesn't be=
sides the cost. If you've got the money or acredit card, the box is yours- =
whoever "you" are.I don't think we should presume anything about the purcha=
sers of thebox. I know people in the filed who have never experienced anyth=
ingevil or dark and wouldn't know what to do if they did. Admittedly,they c=
an be and will be deceitful. I am in full support of further research and g=
roups and individualsworking together. However, IMHO, I think this falls in=
to a differentcategory. Morally and ethically, I think it is short sighted =
toapprove of or promote in any way, the distribution of this device atthis =
time. When we imagine the possibilities, we need to imagine them all.Babs -=
-- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday<paranormalinvestigating@...> =
wrote:>> babiarz3,> > I believe the posts you are referring to about family=
 hour with the box> where written in a light manner in jest. I do not presu=
me to speakfor anyone > else on this group I'm sure they can speak for them=
selves.> > you speak of responsibility with any form of open communication,=
 Ibelieve the individuals that are> studying and distributing the mini box =
are sufficiently experiencedand know who they should sell to and who not.> =
> I don't believe they mean to put the mini box on the shelves in toysr us.=
 Anyone that uses a box whether it be a Frank's box> A Joe's box or a mini =
box will probably have done some research intothis method of evp and will p=
robably have some intimate experience> with the paranormal field and if not=
 I'm sure they will seek advicefrom those of us that have that experience. =
There is never a lack ofadvice here.> > as far as dark heads go I know thro=
ugh personal experience that theycan be deceiving and manipulative with som=
eone that does not know anybetter> I have a Frank's box and a Joe's box and=
 do serious research on adaily basis. My opinion is the good spirits out we=
igh the negativeones and anyone> that experiments with a box will tell you =
that you do forge strongbonds with what I call my spirit guides or technici=
ans, the same twospirits communicate > with me during every session and pro=
tect me from negativity. As longas I do not feed the darkies with my own ne=
gativity I am fine.> > Also I believe that the people who are distributing =
the mini boxhave set that price to deter any average person that's complete=
lyignorant of the paranormal> away from purchasing this device.> > I have n=
ever met bill personally but know of him, he is a wellrespected researcher =
and is well aware I think of the pitfalls as wellas the rewards of box comm=
unication.> and I don't believe he would ever endanger himself, his family =
oranyone else by carelessly using the box for entertainment purposes.> > th=
at Is my opinion for what it's worth.> > Bruce> > > Bruce Halliday Paranorm=
al Investigating Team > > > To: EVP-ITC@...: babiarz3@...: Fri, 23 Nov 2007=
 19:58:45+0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Family hour around the radio> > > > > =
I am a fairly quiet person, most of the time. I have my thoughtsandopinions=
 on topics but feel strongly about "to each his own".Unlesssomething strike=
s me as completely wrong, I won't debate. No oneherehas heard from me other=
 than recently with this mini-box yet, Iamhere several times weekly reading=
 and offering my energy in supportofthe research.However...something is str=
iking me here and again, Ican't keep mymouth shut. The discussion about the=
 family hour with thebox has ledthe way for people to mention negativity an=
d even "the darkguys" canbe fun if not taken seriously.I ask you to conside=
r the factthat many who purchase the mini-boxwill not be of the right frame=
 ofmind. Most will not be in harmony.Many will take "the dark guys"seriousl=
y. Yet, you feel it's a goodidea to let anyone who wants a boxhave one? All=
 in the name ofsharing technology.I know that my previousposts expressing m=
y concern over the massmarketing of the box, wasbarely given consideration.=
 Realize that Iam not being selfish- I donot own a box. EVP is my passion a=
nd hasbeen from day one 6 years agowhen I jumped fully into the field. I am=
successful in capturing EVP,always have been. I still do it the "oldfashion=
ed way" with open airtechniques. Would I love to be able tohold real time 2=
 waycommunications with the other side? Of course.However, I do not thinken=
ough research into the possibilities hasbeen done to warrant theapproval le=
t alone production of these boxes. Those of us who havebeen on countless in=
vestigations with many peoplewill quickly admitthat there are some people w=
e'd rather notinvestigate with. When theyare present, negative things tend =
tohappen. We all know one or twopeople who we can say "felt dark" fromthe f=
irst meeting. We all admitthat being mentally sound is animportant quality =
in this field. If youhave mental issues, this maynot be the area of researc=
h for you. Wedon't bring children oninvestigations for obvious reasons. BUT=
! If youwant a box that couldpossibly open up a portal and bridge the gapbe=
tween here and thedark, sure! Anyone who wants one should have it!You might=
 feel that I am over reacting or being overly dramatic.That'sfine. My conce=
rn is not what you think of me but that youconsider thepossibilities here. =
Many of which we do not know. Can yoube 100% surethat this is a good idea o=
r that it's worthy of saying"well, we'll seewhat happens"? --- In EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com, brucehalliday<paranormalinvestigating@> wrote:>> Bill,> > Y=
ou have theright idea, I recently have dealt with a lot> of negativity from=
 myFrank's box. Harmony is very important> as is the right frame of mindbef=
ore turning the box on.> > hope you & the family had a goodholiday.> > Bruc=
e> > Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team > >> To: EVP-ITC@: vilhel=
lm@: Fri, 23 Nov 2007 02:46:20+0000Subject:[EVP-ITC] Family hour around the=
 radio> > > > > Maybe we're just alittle unconventional in our household, b=
ut mostof us here are prettyopen to the idea of the multiverse. Gathering i=
na circle around ourFrank's Box is our idea of quality family time.The mess=
ages arerelevent, the interest is high, and we're very wellgrounded and do =
notlet the tricksters push us around.HappyThanksgiving from our home toyour=
s. -Bill > > > > > > >_____________________________________________________=
_____> Connectand share in new ways with WindowsLive.>http://www.windowsliv=
e.com/connect.html?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_Wave2_newways_112007>> > > > > > > ____=

ppens with the new Windows Live.Download todayit's FREE!>http://www.windows=
